SELECT ic.content as content, ic.sepc_name as specName, ic.created_time as createTime, u.nickname as nickName, u.face as userFace, ic.comment_level as commentLevel FROM items_comments ic LEFT JOIN users u ON ic.user_id = u.id where ic.item_id = #{itemId}
AND ic.comment_level = #{level}

SELECT i.item_name AS itemName, i.id AS itemId, i.sell_counts AS sellCounts, ii.url AS imgUrl, temp.price as price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT v.item_id, MIN(v.price_discount) AS price FROM items_spec v GROUP BY v.item_id ) temp ON temp.item_id = i.id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
and i.item_name like concat('%',#{paramsMap.keywords},'%')
order by
i.sell_counts desc
temp.price asc
i.item_name asc

SELECT i.item_name AS itemName, i.id AS itemId, i.sell_counts AS sellCounts, ii.url AS imgUrl, temp.price as price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT v.item_id, MIN(v.price_discount) AS price FROM items_spec v GROUP BY v.item_id ) temp ON temp.item_id = i.id WHERE ii.is_main = 1 and i.cat_id = #{paramsMap.catId} order by
i.sell_counts desc
temp.price asc
i.item_name asc

SELECT t_items.id AS itemId, t_items.item_name AS itemName, t_items_spec.id AS specId, t_items_spec.`name` AS specName, t_items_spec.price_discount AS priceDiscount, t_items_spec.price_normal AS priceNormal, t_items_img.url itemImgUrl FROM items_spec t_items_spec LEFT JOIN items t_items ON t_items_spec.item_id = t_items.id LEFT JOIN items_img t_items_img ON t_items_img.item_id = t_items.id WHERE t_items_img.is_main = 1 AND t_items_spec.id IN
#{specId}
